backgroundColor.description: The background color for this wireframe as a String hexadecimal. Follows the #RRGGBBAA color format with the alpha value as optional. The default value is #FFFFFF00.

opacity.description: The opacity of this wireframe. Takes values from 0 to 1, default value is 1.

cornerRadius.description: The corner(border) radius of this wireframe in pixels. The default value is 0.
